parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID.

parameters.name: TopicId
parameters.description: The ID of the topic that contains the refresh schedule that you want to describe. This ID is unique per Amazon Web Services Region for each Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: TopicId
nested_items.description: The ID of the topic that contains the refresh schedule that you want to describe. This ID is unique per Amazon Web Services Region for each Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: TopicArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the topic.

nested_items.name: DatasetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset.

nested_items.name: RefreshSchedule
nested_items.description: The definition of a refresh schedule.

nested_items.name: IsEnabled
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that controls whether to schedule is enabled.

nested_items.name: BasedOnSpiceSchedule
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that controls whether to schedule runs at the same schedule that is specified in SPICE dataset.

nested_items.name: StartingAt
nested_items.description: The starting date and time for the refresh schedule.

nested_items.name: Timezone
nested_items.description: The timezone that you want the refresh schedule to use.

nested_items.name: RepeatAt
nested_items.description: The time of day when the refresh should run, for example, Monday-Sunday.

nested_items.name: TopicScheduleType
nested_items.description: The type of refresh schedule. Valid values for this structure are HOURLY, DAILY, WEEKLY, and MONTHLY.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.
